Nightlight::


Nightlight walked som steps and said while she stopped "Do you rather 
that I wait here while you turn on the defences????"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> Vampirtron: 
>      "Yes, of course, but I could program them to not shoot 
Maximals," Vampirtron said. He walked over to the ship and hit a few 
buttons inside the cockpit. "There, all good."
